name: Arma3-rts-v
body:
### A little about RTS .
The original mission was made by KaRRiLLioN in 2002-2003 in ofp , he remade the mission for arma1.
But desided to move on to different things, So for some time I've been trying to bring RTS back to the arma world.
I failed in arma2, but in Arma3 I found a BIS forum member Zenophon who was and still is developing his own framework
and was interested in all aspects of mission making and coding. (and here we are)
### Zenophon framework
https://forums.bistudio.com/topic/170177-zenophons-arma-3-co-op-mission-making-framework/
### Contact
If your interested in helping in this project, contact me https://forums.bistudio.com/user/765600-dr-death-jm/ 
### or contact me thru steam
http://steamcommunity.com/id/ofp

### Enjoy some youtube
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCslEvZM6QF8V56Lgsm0tjfQ
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
